PlanetCoasterXML

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • PlanetCoasterXML.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Window
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class create the main window with the buttons to choose the 2 files and to create the new file; This class has a listener for each button, plus some threads for the processing.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Window.Elaborate_Files
      Listener that merge the 2 files with a thread (using PlanetCoasterWriter class)
      private class  Window.Find_Duplicates
      Listener that open a file, and check for keys duplicates, saving them in a TXT file (using PlanetCoasterReader class)
      private class  Window.PrintElements
      Listener that print the elements of a file
      private class  Window.XMLFilePath
      Listener for choose the XML file
      This class ask the user to chose a file, then load the file and check for duplicates

      • choose_old_or_new_file

        private int choose_old_or_new_file()
        This function show a popup to let the user choose the first or the second file
        Returns:
        an integer that represent the file chosen, 0 is the first file, 1 the second one

      • manage_choose_old_or_new_file

        private PlanetCoasterReader manage_choose_old_or_new_file()
        This function use the other manage_choose_old_or_new_file
        Currently this is not used, it's here for convenience because it could be useful
        Returns:
        The PlanetCoasterReader corresponding to the first or to the second file

      • manage_choose_old_or_new_file

        private PlanetCoasterReader manage_choose_old_or_new_file(boolean display_errors)
        This function use choose_old_or_new_file() to let the user choose the first or the second file
        If the file is not valid (not loaded) an error occur, and this function return a NULL value
        Parameters:
        display_errors - if the method should use displayError() to show errors to the user
        Returns:
        The PlanetCoasterReader corresponding to the first or to the second file, NULL if the file is not valid (because is not loaded)

        Parameters:
        args - main args
